pro2e.matlabfunctions

Class Fensterfunktionen

  • java.lang.Object
    • pro2e.matlabfunctions.Fensterfunktionen

  • public class Fensterfunktionen
extends java.lang.Object
     Klasse mit statischen Methoden zur Berechnung von Fensterfunktionen
    Author:
    simon 
     see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Window_function
 http://practicalcryptography.com/miscellaneous/machine-learning/implementing-dolph-chebyshev-window/

      static double[] Chebwin(int size, double atten)
      Dolph Chebyshev Fenster - entspricht dem Matlab commad chebwin() chebwin(N,R) returns the N-point Chebyshev window with R decibels of relative sidelobe attenuation.

        Parameters:
        val - array of normalized values (range: 0-1)
        bits - the number of bits
        Returns:
        Double array of the same size as val

        public static double[] Chebwin(int size,

         Dolph Chebyshev Fenster - entspricht dem Matlab commad chebwin()
 chebwin(N,R) returns the N-point Chebyshev window with R decibels of
 relative sidelobe attenuation.
 http://practicalcryptography.com/miscellaneous/machine-learning/implementing-dolph-chebyshev-window/
        Parameters:
        size - size of output array
        atten - attenuation
